name: Mega Water Rally 32
description:
90s Style action racing game, inspired by Wipeout 64 and Rollcage Stage II

        

✓ 4 Unlockable Race Tracks
✓ 5 Unlockable Vehicles
✘ No multiplayer
✓ Headphones recommended Story 

You are a rookie space cop, infiltrating the illegal water rally tournament on the outer rim water planets. Working your way to the top by winning races, to try get cuffs on "Big Daddy", the crime boss that runs the water rally circuit, and who has never lost a tournament.. until now.

- originally planned as cutscenes, dropped due to time.

       

Made in 7 days for 32Bit Jam 2022 (https://itch.io/jam/32bit-jam-2022)

Tools
  • Unity / Aseprite / Blender
  • Music made with Audacity / Cakewalk with Zebrallete
  • Game's Font Credit: http://www.iconian.com/
  • PSX Shader Asset https://tinyurl.com/ye23hzy6
  • Skyboxes by PULSAR BYTES https://tinyurl.com/2p87e6jz

        

Known Bugs Pre Submission

  • Rare occasions of 180degree flipping "why am I now going backwards?" Haven't seen it in a while so it might be fixed.
  • If you tab out, when you come back the next music track will play instantly, don't know why but it's a bug I use as a "skip track" feature so it managed to stay in.
  • On Track 4 - the steep road can cause problems with orientation, causing a bad (slow) fall down, didn't have enough time to fix 100% - just some stuff was added to get through the bug faster.
  • When a level 2 shield is used while a level 1 shield is already active, the visuals won't update - but functionally its all good
